text: Vadodara City assembly constituency (વડોદરા શહેર વિ141ધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Vadodara district. It is reserved for member of Scheduled Caste. This seat came into existence after 2008 delimitation. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Vadodara Taluka (Part) – Vadodara Municipal Corporation (Part) Ward No. – 2, 9, Harni (OG) 13, Sayajipura (OG) 15, Bapod (OG) 16 . ==Total number of voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 221 || 134029 || 124219 || 0 || 258248 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * Until 2012 Vidhan Sabha elections : The seat did not exist. *2012 - Manishaben Vakil, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Manishaben Vakil, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==See also== *List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Vadodara district
title: Vadodara Shaher
